attributes.action: redesign most road junctions to incorporate a filter lane for turning left
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Redesigning most traffic light controlled road junctions to incorporate a filter lane for turning left and/or allowing drivers to turn left while traffic lights are showing red (i.e. treat the junction as a give-way wherever possible) would greatly increase traffic flows thereby reducing journey times, congestion and emmissions. This should also cost less than other anti-congestion proposals.
